snippet: By offering a new DNA standard for tests used in the diagnosis and treatment of disease, the federal government is opening a new era in genetic medicine.
abstract: National Institute of Standards and Technology announces new reference standards that could be used to ensure accuracy of DNA testing; marks important step towards new era in the use of genetic medicine.
lead_paragraph: By offering a new DNA standard for tests used in the diagnosis and treatment of disease, the federal government is opening a new era in genetic medicine.
